remark.p: Counselor, Political Affairs, U.S. Embassy in the Dominican Republic, until July 1974; Assistant Director, Political Military Affairs, Office of Planning and Coordination, Bureau of Inter-American Affairs, Department of State, from July 1974 until August 1976; Detailed, National War College, from August 1976

Counselor, Political Affairs, U.S. Embassy in Santo Domingo until July 1974; Assistant Director, Political Military Affairs, Office of Planning and Coordination, Bureau of Inter-American Affairs, Department of State, from July 1974 until August 1976
